PrivacyPolicyPublic.pageDescription: Learn about how Escore handles your data and protects your privacy
PrivacyPolicyPublic.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPublic.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
PrivacyPolicyPublic.dataProtectionDesc: Your data is encrypted and stored securely
PrivacyPolicyPublic.transparencyDesc: We clearly explain how we use your data
PrivacyPolicyPublic.noContentDesc: The privacy policy content has not been added yet. Please check back later.

Teams Management.title: Teams Management
Teams Management.description: Add Team: Name, Country, Linked Players, Logo/Images

Games Management.title: Games Management
Games Management.description: go to Games Section to Add Game: Name + Icon

News & Updates.title: News & Updates
News & Updates.description: Go to news Section to Add News: Title, Description, Image/Video, Author

Users.title: Users
Users.description: Go to user Section to view Users , Edit email and password , see favorite teams for each user

Support Center.description: Go to Support Center to view user messages and reply to them

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Customize your experience by changing appearance and language.

Privacy and Policy.description: Manage your privacy and Policy configuration settings.

Links.title: Links
